entry.value: This kit demonstrates a fully-featured, AAA user interface solution for PC and console games. It shows splash to in-game content flow, screen resource management, background data loading, video streaming and PC/console input handling with ActionScript 2 content.

This kit demonstrates a fully-featured, AAA user interface solution for PC and console games. It shows splash to in-game content flow, screen resource management, background data loading, video streaming and PC/console input handling with ActionScript 3 content.
